Indian Idol
Name | Hometown | Elimination
--- | --- | ---
Abhijeet Sawant | Mumbai | Winner
Amit Sana | Bhilai | Runner-up
Rahul Vaidya | New Delhi | 2nd Runner-up
Prajakta Shukre | New Delhi | 3rd Runner-up
Ravinder Ravi | Ludhiana | Eliminated 8th
Aditi Paul | Chennai | Eliminated 7th
Mukesh Pancholi | Faridabad | Eliminated 6th
Harish Moyal | Itanagar | Eliminated 5th
Rahul Saxena | Ghaziabad | Eliminated 4th
Amit Tandon | Kolkata | Eliminated 3rd
Vishal Kothari | Kolkata | Eliminated 2nd
Priyanka Venkateshwara | Renukut | Eliminated 1st

wiki_section_title: Season 1

wiki_section_text: Judges Anu MalikFarah KhanSonu Nigam Host Aman VermaMini Mathur Top 12 Contestants : -

intro: Indian Idol is the Indian version of the Pop Idol format that airs on Sony Entertainment Television since 2004. It started airing in India with the first season in 2004-2005 and was followed by second (2005-2006), third (2007), fourth (2008-2009), fifth (2010) and sixth season (2012). For the seventh and eight season Indian Idol Junior replaced the show before the original Indian Idol returned for 9th season in 2016 and the 10th season in 2018. The 11th season in 2019-20 is aired on Sony TV.
